frontmatter.author: Saint Augustine of Hippo
frontmatter.title: An unjust law is no law at all

frontmatter.author: Martin Luther King, Junior
frontmatter.title: One has not only a legal but a moral responsibility to obey just laws.  Conversely one has a moral responsibility to disobey unjust laws.

frontmatter.author: Martin Luther King, Junior
frontmatter.title: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
